alejandro.name: Alejandro
alejandro.description: A charming and manipulative Spanish contestant who uses his good looks and smooth talking to eliminate other players

anne_maria.name: Anne Maria
anne_maria.description: A tan, hair-spray obsessed girl from New Jersey with a tough attitude and distinctive accent

beth.name: Beth
beth.description: An eager-to-please farm girl with braces who desperately wants to be popular and accepted

brick.name: Brick
brick.description: A military-obsessed cadet with a strong sense of honor but afraid of the dark

bridgette.name: Bridgette
bridgette.description: A kind-hearted blonde surfer who is extremely clumsy and accident-prone

cameron.name: Cameron
cameron.description: A weak, sickly genius who lived in a bubble his whole life but has extensive book knowledge

carrie.name: Carrie
carrie.description: A competitive best friend who has unrequited feelings for her racing partner Devin

chef.name: Chef Hatchet
chef.description: Chris McLean's intimidating assistant and cook who serves disgusting food and helps run challenges

courtney.name: Courtney
courtney.description: An uptight overachiever and former CIT who is obsessed with rules and winning at any cost

crimson.name: Crimson
crimson.description: A stoic goth girl who rarely speaks and shows little emotion, paired with Ennui

dakota.name: Dakota
dakota.description: A spoiled rich girl obsessed with fame and social media who transforms into a monster

dawn.name: Dawn
dawn.description: A mystical nature-lover who can communicate with animals and read people's auras

duncan.name: Duncan
duncan.description: A punk juvenile delinquent with green mohawk who acts tough but has a soft side

ella.name: Ella
ella.description: A Disney princess-like contestant who constantly sings and talks to animals

geoff.name: Geoff
geoff.description: A laid-back surfer dude who loves to party and is Bridgette's boyfriend

gwen.name: Gwen
gwen.description: A sarcastic goth girl who prefers books to people and has artistic talents

harold.name: Harold
harold.description: A nerdy red-haired boy with many unexpected skills and a crush on Leshawna

heather.name: Heather
heather.description: A manipulative mean girl who will do anything to win and eliminate her competition

izzy.name: Izzy
izzy.description: A wild, unpredictable redhead who is completely insane but surprisingly resourceful

jasmine.name: Jasmine
jasmine.description: A tall Australian survivalist who is extremely capable in outdoor challenges

jen.name: Jen
jen.description: One of the fashion-obsessed twins who constantly bickers with her sister over style choices

jo.name: Jo
jo.description: An aggressive tomboy athlete who is extremely competitive and masculine

josee.name: Josee
josee.description: A perfectionist ice dancer who becomes violently angry when things don't go her way

julia.name: Julia
julia.description: A social media influencer who maintains a fake nice persona while being manipulative
julia.war_cry: This is going to get so many likes!

kitty.name: Kitty
kitty.description: An upbeat and cheerful sister who always sees the bright side of every situation
kitty.war_cry: This is going to be great!

leonard.name: Leonard
leonard.description: A delusional medieval fantasy enthusiast who believes he has actual magical powers

leshawna.name: Leshawna
leshawna.description: A sassy, confident girl who stands up for herself and others with attitude

lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.description: A narcissistic jock who refers to himself in third person and thinks he's the best at everything

lindsay.name: Lindsay
lindsay.description: A sweet but incredibly ditzy blonde girl who is kind-hearted but not very bright

max.name: Max
max.description: A short wannabe supervillain who dramatically plots evil schemes but is largely ineffective

mike.name: Mike
mike.description: A nice guy with multiple personalities including Svetlana, Vito, Chester, and Manitoba Smith

mk.name: MK
mk.description: A tech-savvy troublemaker who uses her hacking skills to gain advantages in challenges

noah.name: Noah
noah.description: A sarcastic bookworm who prefers using his intelligence over physical ability

owen.name: Owen
owen.description: A lovable, overweight guy who loves food and making friends with everyone

priya.name: Priya
priya.description: A determined perfectionist who was trained by her parents to win Total Drama

rodney.name: Rodney
rodney.description: A large, sweet farm boy who constantly falls in love with female contestants

sam.name: Sam
sam.description: A friendly video game addict who speaks in gaming terminology and loves junk food

samey.name: Samey
samey.description: The nicer twin sister who is constantly bullied and put down by her sister Amy

scarlett.name: Scarlett
scarlett.description: A brilliant but secretly evil genius who hides her true villainous nature behind a meek facade

scott.name: Scott
scott.description: A scheming farm boy who deliberately sabotages his own team to eliminate strong players

shawn.name: Shawn
shawn.description: A paranoid survivalist who is obsessed with preparing for a zombie apocalypse

sky.name: Sky
sky.description: An athletic gymnast who is focused on winning to pay for her Olympic training

sugar.name: Sugar
sugar.description: A rude, gross beauty pageant contestant who thinks she's prettier than she actually is

topher.name: Topher
topher.description: A wannabe TV host who idolizes Chris McLean and wants to steal his job

trent.name: Trent
trent.description: A laid-back musician who plays guitar and tends to be obsessed with the number nine

tyler.name: Tyler
tyler.description: An enthusiastic athlete who thinks he's great at sports but is actually quite clumsy

zoey.name: Zoey
zoey.description: A kind-hearted redhead who sees the good in everyone and loves Mike despite his personalities
